attributes.action: Small scale cannabis growing for personal and medical use
attributes.additional_details:
To make small scale cannabis growing for personal and medical use in your own home

With no more than 4 plants allowed this means that cannabis users and people with medical conditions can grow and consume there own medicine all year round and get rid of the untrust of where it has came from and the worry of funding people breaking the law lets take out these illegal organisation of cannabis factory's for huge profits from gangs and other unlawful people

From this we are hoping to gain licences to people over the age on 18 without a criminal record to grow and smoke there own cannabis in there own premises

However harsh punishments should be in place for people selling possessing having more plants then you should or acting unlawfully in eany way possible

STOP FUNDING CRIMINALS and make personal growing legal as meany country's all ready have not to mention all the medicinal values it can help with as the us who are all ready taking advantage of beneficial plant
